directions: Combine almonds, olive oil, vinegar, water, garlic and salt in a blender; blend until smooth. Add more cold water while blending until desired consistency is reached. The soup should be thick, but still pourable.
Chill soup for a minimum of 15 minutes. Serve garnished with grapes.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons ice-cold water, or as needed
title: Ajoblanco (Cold Spanish Almond Soup)
